column1: * 1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien gives the lecture On Fairy-Stories.
* 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to William Galbraith.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Clyde S. Kilby (8 March 1973).
* 1981 - The first episode of The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2004 - The final day of "RingCon" in wikipedia:Seattle.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee leave Henneth Annûn and say farewell to Faramir. Gollum comes with them.
** Aragorn takes the Paths of the Dead at daybreak. He reaches the Stone of Erech at midnight.
** Théoden and the éoherë travel towards Dunharrow.Category:Datesde:8. Märzfi:8. maaliskuuta
